title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
content: This may not seem like much but the rate at which post spamming occur is quite concerning.however there is a new announcement concerning mixers on the foum of which theymos made in this thread; Mixers to be bannedMany forum members would want to make discussions of different sorts based on the topic but I believe it would spam the meta board. So I suggest that all discussions concerning the mixer announcement be made under theymos's post. In order to make this more effective I suggest the announcement also be pinned in the meta board also till the deadline (Jan 1st) just like most important posts on the meta board. ThanksJust a friendly suggestion.
